Class KnownBanks

Provides a list of banks known to be supported, and the payer id types each one supports.

Inheritance
System.Object
KnownBanks
Inherited Members

Namespace: Yort.OnlineEftpos
Assembly: Yort.OnlineEftpos.dll
Syntax
public static class KnownBanks
Remarks

As this list is hard coded into the library it may or may not be up to date at any given point in time. It should be used only as a UI guide, and not a validation list/authority.

The list is exposed as modifiable collections so if an authoritive source becomes available, this data can be modified at runtime.

AddBank(BankDefinition)

Adds a BankDefinition to the set of known, supported banks.

Declaration
public static bool AddBank(BankDefinition bank)
Parameters
Type Name Description
BankDefinition bank

A BankDefinition instance to be added to the collection of known banks.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

True if the item was succesfully added, otherwise false (usually because the id is a duplicate).
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentException

Thrown if the id of the bank reference is null, empty or only whitespace.
System.ArgumentNullException

Thrown if bank is null.

A BankDefinition containing details of the known bank, or null if no relevant bank was found.
